grad.text: B.Sc. Computer Science at Universidade de São Paulo, São Carlos - SP, Brazil

atip.subitem: Using React, Next.js, StyledComponents and TypeScript in projects, working with the mexican Pepsico team.

encora.subitem: Using React, Vue.js and Laravel in projects

liven.subitem: Using React and React Native in projects

raccoon.subitem: Using React, WordPress, AMP, Next.js, StyledComponets, PHP, HTML, Javascript and SCSS in projects. Also acting as leader of the developers guild, leading knowledge exchange meetings and training interns.

techviz.subitem: Using React, Next.js, Svelte, StyledComponents and TypeScript in projects.

pet.text: Monitor in the Computer Science course for the Elderly at PET Computação for two semesters

principia.text: Volunteer monitor for robotics teaching in public schools through "Principia - Robots at School" for one semester

shehacks.text: Participant of the winning team (among 20 teams) of Shehacks, hackathon held at Facebook headquarters

vemPraUSP.text: Monitors the “Vem Pra USP” online programming teaching program for high school students from public schools

otherframeworks.text: SCSS, AMP, React Native, Vue.js and Svelte

summary.text: Graduated in Computer Science, has five years of experience in web development, mainly as a Front-end Developer. Extensive experience with React and WordPress, among other programming languages and frameworks. Also interested in web accessibility.
